abstract: Egyptian military admits that murder conviction of Ahmed Mansour Qorani Sharara, who is now only three and half years old, was case of mistaken identity; incident sheds stark light on often dysfunctional Egyptian judiciary.

headline.print_headline: Egypt Calls Conviction of Boy, 3, a Mistake
headline.main: Egyptian Military Calls Toddler’s Life Sentence for Murder a Mistake

snippet: After an uproar over the conviction of the boy, Ahmed Mansour Qorani Sharara, the Egyptian military said that it was a case of mistaken identity.
lead_paragraph: After an uproar over the conviction of the boy, Ahmed Mansour Qorani Sharara, the Egyptian military said that it was a case of mistaken identity.
